title: The Cinderella Solution
description: When Charlotte Taylor’s best friend Gabe Donofrio agreed with her that she wasn’t the type of woman men fall in love with, she bet him a thousand dollars she’d have a marriage proposal in three months. She turned her tomboy self into a sexy siren, the world’s most eligible bachelor moved in next door… and Gabe realized he’d made a big mistake!
author: Cathy Yardley
